title: Mozilla account password incorrect and 2fa / backup code incorrect
content:
Let me start off with I've read https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/what-if-im-locked-out-two-step-authentication

I use a password manager and when I tried to sign in it told me the password was incorrect. Little bit concerning, I reset it. Things are going good. It asks me for my 2fa. I enter it. Incorrect. I try it again. Incorrect. Third time. Incorrect. I make sure both my devices' time is correct. They are. I try a separate device. Same issue. I go grab my USB with my backup codes. I put them in. Backup authentication code not found.

And according to the article I'm basically being told to go sodomize myself as Mozilla doesn't provide any support outside of community support.

Is there anything that can be done?

title: I lost access to my account / Perdí el acceso a mi cuenta
content:
My problem is the following:

I was an active user of Firefox, once (for security reasons) I activated the verification in two steps with Google Authenticator (SERIOUS ERROR), after this, I lost my mobile, and with it, the access to my authenticator application. Now, I have access to my personal email, I remember my Firefox account password, but the only problem I have is that I need 2-Step Verification. I want to clarify a couple of points: On the phone that was stolen, all the information was written in a notes app (one-time codes and master key), there is no way to recover it without help. In advance, I thank you and I sincerely hope you can help me to recover access to my account. /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Mi problema es el siguiente:

Yo era usuario activo de Firefox, una vez (por motivos de seguridad) activé la verificación en dos pasos con Google Authenticator (GRAVE ERROR), después de ésto, perdí mi móvil, y con él, el acceso a mi aplicación autenticadora. Ahora bien, tengo acceso a mi correo personal, recuerdo la contraseña de mi cuenta de Firefox, pero el único problema que tengo es que necesito la verificación en dos pasos. Quiero aclarar un par de puntos: En el móvil que me robaron, iba toda la información escrita en una app de notas (códigos de un solo uso y clave maestra), no hay manera de recuperarla sin ayuda. De antemano, agradezco y espero de corazón puedan apoyarme a recuperar el acceso a mi cuenta.
